name: Justin B. Smith
text: @AnandWrites My experiences driving change at the grass roots level have surfaced limitations of scale and execution despite the good that was realized..

name: Justin B. Smith
text: @AnandWrites I've tried both at different times in my life and career - building inner city tutoring programs in DC, raising funds and building primary schools in Burkina Faso, or launching initiatives for teaching quality journalism standard across the African continent and more.

name: Justin B. Smith
text: @AnandWrites It's a version of the long-standing debate of whether change can best be realized from within or outside the power system that currently exists.

name: Justin B. Smith
text: @AnandWrites Hi @AnandWrites and @felixsalmon - always nice to hear from you both. I don't disagree that the private sector should do all the things you suggest. But that doesn't mean there aren't positive opportunities for change that can be developed from within the private sector too.

name: Justin B. Smith
text: @rafat here you go 6m: You can read my full presentation here//t.co/OLZmRXlDbg .

name: Justin B. Smith
text: You can read my full presentation here//t.co/OLZmRXlDbg. With a well-thought-out and executed plan, we can change the current course

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 11) Be relentless about talent and execution. Build your team like collecting art. The group should be greater than the sum of its parts

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 10) Do things that platforms can't do. Position yourselves as custom content creators & strategic partners. Platforms are intermediaries

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 9) Fragment yourself into as many niches as possible. Niche the niche until you're a mosaic, but ensure a strong umbrella brand strategy

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 8) Think global, but operate locally. There is no such thing as a global strategy. Create one for each new region based on local needs

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 7) Define the right video strategy for you. One that is not platform-reliant & focuses on creating high-quality video

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 6) Productize your data. Gathering data is table stakes, but few have cracked the code on how to monetize it

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 5) Reinvent brand advertising & wean yourself off programmatic. Shift resources toward differentiated advertising

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 4) Be tough & picky about platform partnerships. Be willing to walk away from unfair deal terms & court the sleeping giants: telcos, Amazon

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 3) Fight (until your last breath) to keep a direct relationship with your audience. Build your biz around your own products & services

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 2) Become a brand management whiz. Brand is the north star!

name: Justin B. Smith
text: 1) Obsess over differentiation. Chase uniqueness, not scale
